name: MxMedia
tag_list: digital, multimedia, distribution, technology, film, e-books, unique, security, secure
overview:
MxMedia delivers a unique mainstream digital distribution platform for multimedia content.

MxMedia, headquartered in Warsaw, Poland, has developed along with its partners, a unique and patented technology that provides a distinctive transition to a new digital multimedia distribution delivery channel, superior security and control of content, and dynamic high quality entertainment for people at home and on the go. As digital content distributors and technology specialists MxMedia and its partners combine entrepreneurial, media and technology know how to bring a superior user experience directly to consumers and provide an absolutely secure distribution ecosystem for multimedia for all content owners. The inspiration for the project arose as a result of observations and analysis of currently available solutions in the market and the increasing tendency for digital piracy in the wake of a technology boom. The entertainment industry’s challenge is to successfully bridge customer expectations with content owner requirements. MxMedia delivers technology which provides utmost management and security of multimedia distribution to content owners while ensuring an easy and premium digital user experience for the customer anytime anywhere. Customers can rent or buy digital content for off-line playback directly onto any contemporary television, computer, tablet or smart phone on any platform. With declining sales of physical multimedia carriers, an increase of digital content creation, and still limited global broadband access, MxMedia provides a unique solution for a secure mass distribution of downloadable digital content.

As a European company, MxMedia is determined to make its technology available across the entire European continent and beyond over the next couple of years. Starting in Poland, MxMedia will deploy a vast infrastructure of self service digital Kiosks where users can download any content in 30 seconds or less and in parallel provide full access to an internet based platform where users can rent and buy films, TV shows, e-books , audiobooks and other forms of multimedia content. Using a unique Player created by MxMedia, consumers will be able to experience downloaded content on any contemporary TV, computer, tablet or mobile phone via its HDMI and WiFi streaming.
